name: CLEW Labs
overview: CLEW Labs are a team of 10 highly skilled engineers from various web and mobile backgrounds in Silicon Valley. We are a fast moving team that does not believe in bloat or bureaucracy. Based in Sunnyvale, CA we are at the center of the tech industry and are thrilled to be a part of this exciting, fast paced community. If you are interested in working for CLEW please forward your resume to jobs at getsocialstatus dot com.
